includedAssets.title: Growing Pains
includedAssets.synopsis: As she awakens from the accident, Elena finds her greatest fear realised, much to Damon's fury.

includedAssets.title: Memorial
includedAssets.synopsis: Damon tries to help Elena adapt to her new reality, just as a deadly new threat arrives in Mystic Falls.

includedAssets.synopsis: While Stefan tries to teach her that being a vampire isn't all bad, Elena decides to confront Rebekah and Tyler gets a surprise visitor.

includedAssets.title: The Five
includedAssets.synopsis: Elena learns how to feed and Klaus discovers Connor is part of an ancient group of hunters he first encountered in 12th century Italy.

includedAssets.title: We All Go A Little Mad Sometimes
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep6 - We All Go A Little Mad Sometimes
includedAssets.synopsis: The Salvatores frantically search for a way to save Elena as the effects of killing Connor begin to drive her insane.

includedAssets.synopsis: As the Salvatores find their relationship straining to breaking point, Elena helps April prepare for the Miss Mystic Falls pageant.

includedAssets.title: We'll Always Have Bourbon Street
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep8 - We'll Always Have Bourbon Street
includedAssets.synopsis: While Stefan and Damon travel to New Orleans, Elena, Bonnie and Caroline have a disastrous girls' night.

includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep9 - O Come, All Ye Faithful
includedAssets.synopsis: Stefan takes decisive action against Klaus and the hybrids, forcing Caroline to act as Klaus's date to the Mystic Falls winter party.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Stefan takes decisive action against Klaus and the hybrids, forcing Caroline to act as Klaus's date to the Mystic Falls winter party.

includedAssets.synopsis: While Bonnie's father steps in as interim mayor, Elena finds herself trapped by Rebekah, forcing Stefan to launch a rescue mission.

includedAssets.synopsis: Damon tries to prepare Jeremy to face the new vampires, Rebekah attempts to ally with Stefan and Elena makes a plea to Klaus.
